required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Consumer Knowledge, Attitude, and Behavior Towards Aging Skin
clinical_study.official_title: Consumer Knowledge, Attitude, and Behavior Towards Aging Skin

brief_summary.textblock: We will conduct a cross-sectional survey from adults 18 years of age and older to examine consumer knowledge, attitudes and behavior towards aging skin.

detailed_description.textblock:
We will perform a cross-sectional survey study to understand the significance of age-related skin changes to consumers. We will recruit participants through ResearchMatch (a national free and secure online tool) and collect the following data:
Demographic information, including age, gender, race/ethnicity, geographic location, and yearly household income
- How do participants feel towards their own skin and age-related skin changes?
- Which aging-related skin changes are the most significant?
- What factors affect how participants feel towards their skin?
- What role do age-related skin changes play in other aspects of the participants' lives, such as their social and work life?
- What treatments are participants currently seeking, and what are their goals for these treatments?
- How much do they prioritize these treatments?
- What else are they hoping to do?
Using the demographic information, we will also analyze whether there are differences with:
- Age
- Gender identity
- Racial/ethnic identity
- Marital status
- Geographic location
- Yearly household income

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency (percentage) of participants with aging-related skin concerns
primary_outcome.description: to determine the frequency of participants who indicate having aging-related skin concerns

primary_outcome.measure: Frequency (percentage) of participants with social and work life impact of age-related skin changes
primary_outcome.description: To determine the frequency of participants who indicate age-related skin changes impact their social and work life

primary_outcome.measure: Measure (count) the type of treatments participants are currently seeking for aging skin concerns
primary_outcome.description: To summarize the number of participants who would prioritize certain treatments for aging skin concerns

secondary_outcome.description: Demographic information, including age, gender, race/ethnicity, geographic location, marital status and yearly household income will be summarize with means and standard deviations.

study_pop.textblock: Open to male and female English-speaking adults(18 years or older)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The study will include English-speaking adults (18 years or older) who voluntarily consent to participate in the survey.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participants under the age of 18 and non-English speaking participants.

facility.name: Northwestern University Fienberg School of Medicine Department of Dermatology
